hero.headline: Stop Guessing. Start Brewing.
hero.subheadline: Welcome to the Coffee Brewing Assistant, your friendly guide to the perfect cup. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned barista, our adaptive recipes and step-by-step guides empower you to brew with confidence.

features.title: Adaptive Recipes
features.description: Our app doesn't use static recipes. It intelligently calculates the ideal water, coffee, and timing based on your preferences for a perfect extraction every time.

features.title: Guided Brewing
features.description: Never miss a step. From pre-heating your kettle to the final swirl, our interactive timer and checklist guide you through every moment of the brewing process.

features.title: Complete Customization
features.description: Your coffee, your rules. Tweak every variable, from coffee-to-water ratios to individual pour durations, and save your perfect recipe for next time.
